page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
IN{LUTHRIE}AND{MOONZIE}WE HAVE TO MAKE OUR OWN{ENTERTAINMENT}(BECAUSE WE ARE ISOLATED).THE SORTS OF THINGS PEOPLE SAY THEY DO LOCALLY ARE AS FOLLOWS, {THEY GO TO THE VILLAGE HALL TO DANCE {AND ATTEND CONCERTS AND PLAYS;THEY {GARDEN AND GO TO THE S.W.R.I. AND THE {MEN'S CLUB; SOME PEOPLE LISTEN TO {MUSIC AND/OR MAKE MUSIC;THEY GO {SHOOTING.}MOST PEOPLE READ{BOOKS.
HERE ARE THE SORTS OF THINGS PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL AWAY TO DO;{THEY GO {HILLWALKING;ONE PERSON IS AN AMATEUR {PHOTOGRAPHER;SOME PEOPLE GO TO PUBS, {AND SOME PEOPLE GO FISHING.}SOME PEOPLE ENTERTAIN OTHERS BY GIVING{TEA {OR DINNER PARTIES.}MOST PEOPLE STAY AT HOME AND GO OUT RARELY.
